Name: Heat Runner
About the game: RAGE GAMES NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR BROKEN SPACEBARS!!!!!!!!!!! BRIEF RUNDOWN --- Heat Runner offers fun but CHALLENGING Floor is Lava action. Across 5 chapters, Run and jump across various platforms, buildings, and more. Meanwhile discovering the secrets behind L-labs diabolical operation. DETAILED DESCRIPTION --- Play as a former free-running social media influencer as he was hired on by an unknown resistance to try and thwart the corrupted company L-labs operations. The CEO intends to over-flow the earth with lava, effectively wiping out the human race. Jump through sinking and destroyed buildings, destroy L-labs's Generators, and explore a vast city, and uncover their motives. The fate of the world... lies with you.
